title: 'Nice Customer Service'
body: 'Editing this review since customer service team contacted and promised to set it alright. so modified my review to 4star. Once all set will give a 5star rating. Thank you wakefit team for the support without just ignoring. Leg screws are got loose n the legs got bend after 3months usage. It got moves while one sits.'

title: 'Nice Sofa'
body: 'I had doubts about buying sofa online. After going through the reviews i want to try it. After buying it
column5: this sofa has completely satisfied my requirements. Went with 3 seater sofa - Solatio dark blue color. This nicely added contrast to my beige wall. This sofa is neat and sturdy. It also came with 3 big sofa pillows. It can be easily moved around. Cushion thickness is good. The only minor issue is that the back rest is of medium height and is too far back so we always ended up sitting with the pillows only for proper back support. Safely packaged. Prompt delivery. Would highly recommend.'
